Text:
When you split a video file into you shouldn't be able to recognize it when playing both files back to back in the playlist if it was split right.  This one wasn't.  

Even merged together there's a second missing.  And the video shouldn't have bars from top to bottom given the fact that it's resolution adds bars to.  

It makes a good quality video like this one look like a ghetto widescreen wanna-be.  V=8 A=9

A decent download but given the fact that this film is over 6 years old & this torrent's upload date, you'd expect better.
